thread.section_title: Hotel HELUSSI - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top service..
thread.title_full: Top service.. - Review of Hotel HELUSSI, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: larsks
title: Top service..
text:
We have just stayed two days at Hotel Helussi, from the moment we came to the moment we left were we in very good hands. We were met with a cup off coffee while they the made check in. The arranged for a table reservation at a very good restaurant nearby. They have a big insight of Paris.
Room Tip: Take a room with a small balcony, it is wonderful to be outside with a viev of Paris See more room tips
